1.name: a jail cell
1.description:
a small room with a metal bed in one corner.
You said 'No jail can hold me'
You notice a jailkey sitting on your bed

bed.description: Hard looks cold. Has a jailkey sitting on top of it

north.lockedMsg: You need a key to open this door
north.unlockMsg: You reach around the door and use the jail key
breaks: The key gets stuck in the door rending it useless

2.name: a hallway
2.description: a big long room with a sword on a table in the corner

table.description: A small wooden table in the corner of the hallway. Has a sword on top of it.

3.name: a jail cell
3.description: a small room with a metal bed in one corner.

bed.description: Hard looks cold. Has bones on the top of it.

4.name: a jail cell
4.description: a small room with a metal bed in one corner.

5.name: a hallway
5.description: a smaller room with a rat in the middle of it

6.name: a hallway
6.description: a smaller room with a goon blocking the exit

says.start: Do you want me to move?

yes.start: Ok I'll move. Oh and take this.

no.start:
You stare at each other for a prolonged period of time. Longer than any two people should stare at each other. But you feel a sense of uprising as you stare at him. He stares at you back. Unblinking.
'You sure you don't want me to move?' he says

yes.start: Ok I'll move. Oh and take this.

no.start: You continue to stare at each other untill the end of time. The game ends.

north.lockedMsg: You need a key to open this door
north.unlockMsg: You use the key to open the door

1.name: a feild
1.description:
a large open feild with a parthway that runs through it.
In front of you there is a sign which states that to the east there is the town of Townington and to the west there is the castle.

sign.description: Says to the east there is the town of Townington and to the west there is the castle.

2.name: path to Townington
2.description: a path you see a town in the distance.

3.name: path to the castle
3.description: A path you see a castle in the distance.

1.name: Townington gates
1.description:
the large wooden gates stand in front of you.
'Who goes there?' a voice says from above.'I am but a weary traveler looking for adventure' you respond
The gates open in front of you 'Welcome to Townington' the voice says.

2.name: main road
2.description: a road leading to the town center is surrounded in houses.

3.name: town center
3.description: a large fountain surrounded with shops. You see an old man sitting on the fountain.

says.start: Hello adventure. What do you need?

quests.start: Oh then. We have no need for quests the king is not currupt and nobody needs saving.

sure.start:
Now that I think about it we have lost our village pet. A rat named David.
He was soo nice have you seen him? I sent my son to go looking for him but he hasn't returned.
This will assist you on your quest.

4.name: suburbs
4.description: has moderately sized houses and people walking around.

5.name: large house
5.description: a large house. You stand in front of it looking up at it's vastness. You feel a sense of fear. You decide to leave

6.name: shops
6.description: an area with shops you see many people go about their daily busness and nobody paies attention to you.
